cleaned_text: I Clinical Herbalist The average age of menopause is 51, but many women report starting to feel the symptoms of peri-menopause around 42. This is not a one time moment. The four pillars of health that affect menopause symptoms are: Sleep Stress Diet Exercise My favorite herbs to support women (and non-binary folx) going through peri-menopause symptoms are sleep herbs and adaptogens (ashwagandha is one of my faves).
